lal23:2: atha khalu śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrā bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇaṁ tathāgataṁ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya divyaiścandanacūrṇavarṣairabhyavakīrya ābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhirabhituṣṭuvuḥ—
lal23:18: na te kalpasahasrāṇi jātu yāsyanti durgatim ||
lal23:21: mokṣyante ca laghuṁ sarve chittvā vai kleśabandhanam |
lal23:25: evaṁ khalu bhikṣavaḥ śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrāstathāgatamabhiṣṭutyaikānte prāñjalayastasthuḥ, prāñjalayastathāgataṁ namasyantaḥ ||
lal23:26: atha khalu cābhāsvarā devaputrāstathāgataṁ bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇaṁ divyairnānāprakāraiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanachatradhvajapatākābhiḥ saṁpūjya tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya cābhirgāthābhirabhyastāviṣuḥ—
lal23:27: gambhīrabuddhe madhurasvarā mune brahmasvarā munivaragīta susvaram |
lal23:29: trātāsi dīpo ’si parāyaṇo ’si nātho ’si loke kṛpamaitracittaḥ |
lal23:30: vaidyottamastvaṁ khalu śalyahartā cikitsakastvaṁ paramaṁ hitaṁkaraḥ ||
lal23:32: pramuñca nāthā amṛtasya dhārāṁ śamehi tāpaṁ suramānuṣāṇām ||
lal23:33: tvaṁ padmabhūtaṁ tribhaveṣvaliptaṁ tvaṁ merukalpo vicalo hyakampyaḥ |
lal23:34: tvaṁ vajrakalpo hyacalapratijña tvaṁ candramā sarvaguṇāgradhārī ||
lal23:35: evaṁ khalu bhikṣava ābhāsvarā devāstathāgatamabhisaṁstutyaikānte tasthuḥ prāñjalayastathāgataṁ namasyantaḥ ||
lal23:36: atha khalu subrahmadevaputrapramukhā brahmakāyikā devāstathāgataṁ bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇamanekamaṇiratnakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrapratyuptena ratnajālenābhichādya tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya cābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhirabhyastāviṣuḥ—
lal23:38: smṛtimaṁ matimaṁ guṇajñānadharā akilāntakā śirasi vandami te ||
lal23:41: kalikaluṣa uddhṛta sudāntamanā kṛpakaruṇa udgata jagārthakarā |
lal23:42: muni mudita udgata praśāntamanā dvayamativimocaka upekṣaratā ||
lal23:45: balavīrya āgatu ihā namuci prajñāya vīrya tava maitrya jito |
lal23:46: prāptaṁ ca te padavaraṁ amṛtaṁ vandāma te śaṭhacamūmathanā ||
lal23:47: evaṁ khalu bhikṣavaḥ subrahmadevaputrapramukhā brahmakāyikā devāstathāgatamābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭutya ekānte tasthuḥ prāñjalayastathāgataṁ namasyantaḥ ||
lal23:48: atha khalu te śuklapākṣikā māraputrā yena tathāgatastenopasaṁkrāman | upasaṁkramya mahāratnachatravitānaistathāgatamabhicchādya prāñjalayastathāgatamābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhirabhyastāviṣuḥ—
lal23:49: pratyakṣe ’smi bale tavātivipule mārasya ghorā camū
lal23:50: yatsā māracamū mahāpratibhayā ekakṣaṇe te jitā |
lal23:51: na ca te utthitu naiva kāyu trasito no vā girā vyāhṛtā
lal23:54: te tubhyaṁ na samartha bodhisuvaṭā saṁcālituṁ kampitum |
lal23:58: dāsāstathā udyānā nagarāṇi rāṣṭranigamā rājyāni sāntaḥpurāḥ |
lal23:59: hastā pādaśirottamāṅgamapi vā cakṣūṁṣi jihvā tathā
lal23:60: tyaktā te varabodhicarya caratā tenādya vibhrājase ||
lal23:61: uktaṁ yadvacanaṁ tvayā subahuśo buddho bhaviṣyāmyahaṁ
lal23:64: sā caiṣā pratipūrṇa tubhya praṇidhistāriṣyase prāṇinaḥ ||
lal23:65: yatpuṇyaṁ ca stavitva vādivṛṣabhaṁ lokasya cakṣurdadaṁ
lal23:69: evaṁ khalu bhikṣavo māraputrāstathāgatamabhiṣṭutyaikānte tasthuḥ prāñjalayastathāgataṁ namasyantaḥ ||
lal23:70: atha khalu paranirmitavaśavartī devaputro ’nekairdevaputraśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto jāmbūnadasuvarṇavarṇaiḥ padmaistathāgatamabhyavakīrya saṁmukhamābhirgāthābhirabhyastāvīt—
lal23:72: arahasi divi bhuvi śriyakriyamatulā atidyutismṛtimati praṇipati śirasā ||
lal23:73: ratikara raṇajaha rajamalamathanā ramayasi suranara suviśadavacanaiḥ |
lal23:74: vikasita suvipula varatanu kiraṇaiḥ suranarapatiriva jayasi jagadidam ||
lal23:75: paragaṇipramathana paracarikuśalā priyu bhava naramaru paramati dhunatā |
lal23:76: paracari vibhajasi sunipuṇamatimān pathi iha vicaratu daśabalagamane ||
lal23:77: tyaji pṛthu bhavagrahi vitathadukha mahā vinayasi suranara yathamati vinaye |
lal23:78: vicarasi catudiśa śaśiriva gagane cakṣu bhava parāyaṇa iha bhuvi tribhave ||
lal23:79: priyu bhava naramaru na ca khali viṣaye ramayasi śubharati kāmarativirato |
lal23:80: dinadarśi pariṣadi na ti samu tribhave nāthu gati parāyaṇu tvamiha hi jagataḥ ||
lal23:81: evaṁ khalu bhikṣavo vaśavartidevapramukhāḥ parinirmitavaśavartino devaputrāstathāgatamabhiṣṭutyaikānte tasthuḥ prāñjalayastathāgataṁ namasyantaḥ ||
lal23:82: atha khalu sunirmito devaputro devasaṁghaparivṛtaḥ puraskṛto nānāratnapaṭṭadāmaistathāgatamabhichādya saṁmukhamābhirgāthābhirabhyastāvīt—
lal23:86: utpanno iha loki cetiyo divi bhuvi mahitaḥ ||
lal23:102: vande tvāṁ trisahasri adbhutaṁ divi bhuvi mahitam ||
lal23:103: evaṁ khalu bhikṣavaḥ sunirmito devaputraḥ saparivārastathāgatamabhiṣṭutyaikānte ’sthāt prāñjalīkṛtastathāgataṁ namaskurvan ||
lal23:104: atha khalu saṁtuṣito devaputraḥ sārdhaṁ tuṣitakāyikairdevairyena tathāgatastenopasaṁkrāmat | upasaṁkramya mahatā divyavastrajālena bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇaṁ tathāgatamabhisaṁchādya saṁmukhamābhirgāthābhirabhyastauṣīt—
lal23:105: tuṣitālayi yadvasitastvaṁ tatra ti deśitu dharma udāro |
lal23:106: na ca chidyati sā anuśāsti adyapi dharmacarī suraputrā ||
lal23:107: na ca darśana tṛpti labhāmo dharma śṛṇotu na vindati tṛptim |
lal23:108: guṇasāgara lokapradīpā vandima te śirasā manasā ca ||
lal23:109: tuṣitālaya yaccalitastvaṁ śoṣita akṣaṇa sarvi tadā te |
lal23:110: yada bodhivaṭe upaviṣṭaḥ sarvajagasya kileśa praśāntāḥ ||
lal23:111: yasya kṛtena ca bodhi udārā eṣa ti prāpti jinitvana māram |
lal23:112: tvā praṇidhī tapasā paripūrṇā kṣipra pravartaya cakramudāram ||
lal23:113: bahu dikṣiṣu prāṇisahasrā dharmaratā kṣuṇiyāmatha dharmam |
lal23:114: kṣipra pravartaya cakramudāraṁ mocaya prāṇisahasra bhaveṣu ||
lal23:115: evaṁ khalu bhikṣavaḥ saṁtuṣito devaputraḥ saparivārastathāgatamabhiṣṭatyaikānte ’sthāt prāñjalīkṛtastathāgataṁ namasyamānaḥ ||
lal23:116: atha khalu suyāmadevaputrapramukhāḥ suyāmā devā yena tathāgatastenopasaṁkrāmat |
lal23:118: sadṛśo ’sti na te kutontare śīla samādhi tathaiva prajñayā |
lal23:120: dṛṣṭā sa viyūha śobhanā bodhimaṇḍasmi marubhi yā kṛtā |
lal23:121: na tamarhati anya kaścanā yatha tvaṁ devamanuṣyapūjitaḥ ||
lal23:122: na mudhāya bhavān samudgato yasya arthe bahu cīrṇa duṣkarā |
lal23:123: vijito hi śaṭhaḥ sasainyakaḥ prāptā bodhi anuttarā tvayā ||
lal23:124: āloka kṛto daśādiśe prajñādīpena triloka jvālitaḥ |
lal23:126: bahukalpa stuvanti bhāṣato romarūpasya na cāntu asti te |
lal23:127: guṇasāgara lokaviśrutā śirasā vandima te tathāgatam ||
lal23:128: evaṁ khalu te suyāmadevaputrapramukhā devāstathāgatamabhiṣṭutyaikānte tasthuḥ prāñjalastathāgataṁ namasyantaḥ ||
lal23:129: atha khalu śakro devānāmindraḥ sārdhaṁ trāyatriṁśakāyikairdevairnānāpuṣpadhūpadīpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvarachatradhvajapatākāvyūhaistathāgataṁ saṁpūjya ābhirgāthābhirabhyastāvīt—
lal23:130: askhalitā anavadyā sadā susthitā merukalpā mune
lal23:133: tasya viśeṣu yena bodhidrume mārasenā jitā ||
lal23:143: mā khu śramaṇarāju bādhiṣyate bodhimaṇḍe sthitaḥ |
lal23:144: na ca bhavatu babhūva tebhyo bhayaṁ no ca kāyeñjanā
lal23:146: yatha ca purimakebhi siṁhāsane prāpta bodhi varā
lal23:147: tatha tvayā anubuddha tulyā samā anyathā tvaṁ na hi |
lal23:148: samamanasa samacitta sarvajñatā sthāma prāptaṁ tvayā
lal23:149: tena bhava svayaṁbhu lokottamo puṇyakṣetraṁ jage ||
lal23:150: evaṁ khalu bhikṣavaḥ śakro devānāmindraḥ sārdhaṁ devaputraistrāyatriṁśaistathāgatamabhiṣṭutyaikānte ’sthāt prāñjalīkṛtastathāgataṁ namaskurvan ||
lal23:151: atha khalu catvāro mahārājānaḥ sārdhaṁ caturmahārājakāyikairdevaputrairyena tathāgatastenopasaṁkrāmat | upasaṁkramyābhimuktakacampakasumanāvārṣikadhānuskārimālyadāmaparigṛhītā apsaraḥśatasahasraparivṛtā divyasaṁgītisaṁpravāditena tathāgatasya pūjāṁ kṛtvā ābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhistuṣṭuvuḥ—
lal23:152: sumadhuravacanā manojñaghoṣā śaśi va praśāntikarā prasannacittā |
lal23:154: rutaravita ya asti sarvaloke sumadhura premaṇiyā narāmarūṇām |
lal23:155: bhavata svaru pramukta mañjughoṣo abhibhavate ruta sarvi bhāṣamāṇāṁ ||
lal23:156: rāgu samayi doṣamohakleśā prīti janeti amānuṣāṁ viśuddhām |
lal23:157: akaluṣahṛdayā niśāmya dharmaṁ ārya vimukti labhanti te hi sarve ||
lal23:158: na ca bhava atimanyase avidvāṁ na ca puna vidvamadena jātu mattaḥ |
lal23:159: unnatu na ca naiva conatastvaṁ giririva susthitu sāgarasya madhye ||
lal23:160: lābha iha sulabdha mānuṣāṇāṁ yatra hi tādṛśu jātu sattva loke |
lal23:161: śrīriva padumo dhanasya dātrī tatha tava dāsyati dharmu sarvaloke ||
lal23:162: evaṁ khalu caturmahārājapramukhā mahārājakāyikā devā bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇaṁ tathāgatamabhiṣṭutyaikānte tasthuḥ prāñjalayastathāgataṁ namasyantaḥ ||
lal23:163: atha khalvantarikṣā devāstathāgatasyāntikamupasaṁkramyābhisaṁbodheḥ pūjākarmaṇe sarvamantarīkṣaṁ ratnajālena kiṅkiṇījālena ratnachatrai ratnapatākābhī ratnapaṭṭadāmai ratnāvataṁsakairvividhamuktāhārapuṣpadāmārdhakāyikadevatāparigṛhītairardhacandrakaiśca samalaṁkṛtya tathāgatāya niryātayanti sma | niryātya ca saṁmukhamābhirgāthābhirabhyastāviṣuḥ—
lal23:164: asmāku vāsaṁ gagane dhruvaṁ mune paśyāma sattvā cariyā yathā jage |
lal23:165: bhavataścariṁ prekṣiya śuddhasattva skhalitaṁ na paśyāma tavaikacitte ||
lal23:166: ye āgatā pūjana bodhisattvā gaganaṁ sphuṭaṁ tairnaranāyakebhiḥ |
lal23:167: hānirvimānāna na cābhavanta tathā hi te vai gaganātmabhāvāḥ ||
lal23:168: ye antarīkṣātu pravarṣi puṣpāṁ syāccūḍabandhā hi mahāsahasrā |
lal23:169: te tubhya kāye patitā aśeṣā nadyo yathā sāgari saṁpraviṣṭāḥ ||
lal23:171: hārāṁśca candrāṁśca tathārdhacandrāṁ kṣipanti devā na ca saṁskaroti ||
lal23:172: vālasya nābhūdavakāśamasmin devaiḥ sphuṭaṁ sarvata antarīkṣam |
lal23:173: kurvanti pūjāṁ dvipadottamasya na ca te mado jāyati vismayo vā ||
lal23:174: evaṁ khalvantarīkṣadevā bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇaṁ tathāgatamabhiṣṭutyaikānte ’vatasthivantaḥ prāñjalayastathāgataṁ namasyantaḥ ||
lal23:175: atha khalu bhaumā devāstathāgatasya pūjākarmaṇe sarvāvantaṁ dharaṇītalaṁ suśodhitopaliptaṁ gandhodakapariṣiktaṁ puṣpāvakīrṇaṁ ca kṛtvā nānādūṣyavitānavitataṁ ca tathāgatāya niryātayanti sma | ābhirgāthābhirabhituṣṭuvuḥ—
lal23:176: vajramiva abhedyā saṁsthitā triḥsahasrā vajramayapadenāyaṁ sthito bodhimaṇḍe |
lal23:177: iha mama tvacamāṁsaṁ śuṣyatāmasthimajjā na ca ahu aspṛśitvā bodhi uttheṣya asmāt ||
lal23:178: savibhava narasiṁhā sarviyaṁ triḥsahasrā na kariṣu adhisthānaṁ syādvidīrṇaśeṣā |
lal23:179: tādṛśa mahavegā āgatā bodhisattvā yeṣa kramatalebhiḥ kampitā kṣetrakoṭyaḥ ||
lal23:180: lābha iha sulabdhā bhūmidevairudārā yatra paramasattvaścaṁkramī medinīye |
lal23:181: yatra ku raju loke sarva obhāsitāste cetibhu trisahasraḥ kiṁ punastubhya kāyaḥ ||
lal23:182: hesti śatasahasraṁ yāvataścāpaskandho dharaṇitalu jagasyā yāvataścopajīvyaḥ |
lal23:183: sarva vayu dharemo medinī triḥsahasrāṁ sarva tava dadāmo bhuṅkṣvimāṁ tvaṁ yatheṣṭam ||
lal23:184: yatra bhava sthihedvā caṁkramedvā śayedvā ye ’pi sugataputrāḥ śrāvakā gautamasya |
lal23:185: dharmakatha kathentī ye ’pi vā tāṁ śṛṇonti sarvakuśalamūlaṁ bodhiye nāmayāmaḥ ||
lal23:186: evaṁ khalu bhaumā devā bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇaṁ tathāgatamabhiṣṭatyaikānte tasthuḥ prāñjalayastathāgataṁ namasyantaḥ ||
